response.summary:
I am an Industrial Engineer of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia and an Analytics Magister at the Universidad de los Andes. I have five years of experience in Revenue Management in the aviation industry that have allowed me to develop skills for data analysis, strategy design and decision making. 
I have knowledge and abilities to build descriptive and predictive models, statistical analysis, data mining and visualization of information and I have also worked leading teams. 
As an organized, methodical, and creative person with skills for teamwork, oral and written communication and leadership, I consider myself as someone who has both analytical and strategic skills in order to achieve appropriate action for the enterprise goals.
response.skills: Consumer Behavior, Visualización, Liderazgo de equipos, Análisis de datos, Toma de decisiones empresariales, Optimización, Revenue Management, R, Microsoft Access, Python, SPSS, Stata, Microsoft Excel, Trabajo en equipo, Aptitudes para la comunicación, Inglés, Francés, Software de simulación, MicroStrategy, Programación

profile_positions.description: Lead the opportunities identification in order to maximize revenue. Support the design of processes, the creation of reports, tools and models for data analysis to improve demand forecasts, as well as availability management in the markets the team is responsible for. Track of KPIs. Revenue budget preparation. Scenarios and impacts estimation.
profile_positions.title: Demand and Availability Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Define strategies through the analysis of different variables such as market size, competitors, seasonality, market share, pricing, segmentation, economic environment, among others, to maximize the revenues of the markets in charge through the forecast calibration and availability strategy.
profile_positions.title: Demand and Availability Analyst

profile_positions.description: Participation in the project "Guidelines on integral policies to structure the district urban logistics system of Bogota"
profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher

profile_positions.description: Support to the System of Failures Elimination in the department of packaging and manufacture of shampoo and conditioner by analyzing the events recurrence.
profile_positions.title: Intern

company.name: Novo Nordisk
company.description:
Novo Nordisk is a leading global healthcare company, founded in 1923 and headquartered in Denmark. Our purpose is to drive change to defeat diabetes and other serious chronic diseases such as obesity and rare blood and endocrine disorders. We do so by pioneering scientific breakthroughs, expanding access to our medicines, and working to prevent and ultimately cure disease. Novo Nordisk employs about 54,400 people in 80 countries and markets its products in around 170 countries. For more information visit novonordisk.com.

This page isn’t intended for discussions about products.  As such, postings or comments that contain product discussions may be removed. This page is for discussions about Novo Nordisk and its subsidiaries and the initiatives and projects we are involved in. While we welcome everyone to make comments, we reserve the right to remove those that are off-topic, abusive or intended to spam. 

Any questions specific to products should be made to your healthcare professional. If you wish to file an adverse drug reaction please contact Novo Nordisk’s office in the country you live in: 
https://www.novonordisk.com/contact-us/find-local-information.html

For other customer complaints, please contact us here: 
https://www.novonordisk.com/contact-us.html

Please keep in mind that Novo Nordisk A/S and its subsidiaries work within a highly regulated industries. Therefore, comments that pertain to legal matters or regulatory issues may be removed. 

Comments contained on this site come from members of the public, and do not necessarily reflect the views of Novo Nordisk A/S. Novo Nordisk A/S does not endorse or approve any content added by other LinkedIn users.

Learn more about our privacy disclaimer and community guidelines here http://www.novonordisk.com/communityguidelines
